attributes.action: save brackenborough post office in louth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: louth in lincolnshire cannot cope with post office on an avarage you are waiting anything up 1/2 an hour brackenborough post office have alot of business using it which quick and very helpful with the town growing one post office will never cope keep brackenborough road and most of the oap live near by
